entry.title: The Planning Act 2008 (Commencement No. 6) Order 2011
entry.summary: Article 2 of this Order brings into force, on 6th April, 2011, the following provisions of the Act, in relation to England and Wales—

entry.title: The Public Services Reform (Joint Inspections) (Scotland) Regulations 2011

ukm:Supersedes.dc:title: The Public Services Reform (Joint Inspections) (Scotland) Regulations 2011

entry.summary: These Regulations make provision concerning joint inspections carried out under section 1155 of the Public Services (Reform) Scotland Act 2010 (‘the Act’).

entry.title: The Legal Services (Scotland) Act 2010 (Commencement No. 1 and Saving Provision) Order 2011
entry.summary: This Order brings into force various provisions of the Legal Services (Scotland) Act 2010 (“the Act”). The Act received Royal Assent on 9th November 2010. Sections 146 to 150 came into force on the day after that day.

entry.title: The Welfare Reform Act 2009 (Commencement No. 4) Order 2011
entry.summary: This Order brings into force the following provisions of the Welfare Reform Act 2009—

title.div: The National Health Service (Travelling Expenses and Remission of Charges) (Wales) (Amendment) Regulations 2011 / Rheoliadau'r Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol (Treuliau Teithio a Pheidio â Chodi Tâl) (Cymru) (Diwygio) 2011

div.p: These Regulations, which apply in relation to Wales, further amend the National Health Service (Travelling Expenses and Remission of Charges) (Wales) Regulations 2007 (“the principal Regulations”). Those Regulations provide for the payment of travel expenses to, and the remission of National Health Service (NHS) charges for, amongst others, persons on low incomes, by reference to limits on their income and capital.

Mae'r Rheoliadau hyn, sy'n gymwys o ran Cymru, yn diwygio ymhellach Reoliadau'r Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol (Treuliau Teithio a Pheidio â Chodi Tâl) (Cymru) 2007 (“y prif Reoliadau”). Mae'r Rheoliadau hynny yn darparu ar gyfer talu treuliau teithio i bersonau, ymhlith eraill, sydd ar incwm isel, a pheidio â chodi ffioedd y Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol (GIG) ar y personau hynny, drwy gyfeirio at derfynau ar eu hincwm a'u cyfalaf.

entry.title: The Healthcare Improvement Scotland (Requirements as to Independent Health Care Services) Regulations 2011

ukm:Supersedes.dc:title: The Healthcare Improvement Scotland (Requirements as to Independent Health Care Services) Regulations 2011

entry.summary: These Regulations set out requirements which must be complied with by providers of independent healthcare services under the National Health Service (Scotland) Act 1978. An independent healthcare service must be provided in accordance with the general principles set out in regulation2.

div.p: This Order, made under the Animal Health Act 1981, confers powers on the Welsh Ministers in relation to tuberculosis in Wales.
Mae'r Gorchymyn hwn, a wnaed o dan Ddeddf Iechyd Anifeiliaid 1981 yn rhoi pwerau i Weinidogion Cymru mewn perthynas â thwbercwlosis yng Nghymru.

title.div: The Visits to Former Looked After Children in Detention (Wales) Regulations 2011 / Rheoliadau Ymweliadau â Phlant dan Gadwad a fu'n Derbyn Gofal (Cymru) 2011

div.p: These Regulations make provision about visiting requirements for children and young people who were looked after by a local authority but have ceased to be so as a result of being detained in an institution, either having been remanded to prison custody or following conviction and sentencing by a court. Those who will have ceased to be looked after will be children and young people who, prior to entering custody, were either provided with accommodation under section 20 of the Children Act 1989 (“the 1989 Act”) or who had been remanded to local authority care under section 23(1) of the Children and Young Persons Act 1969 on sentencing.

Mae'r Rheoliadau hyn yn gwneud darpariaeth ynghylch gofynion ymweld ar gyfer plant a phobl ifanc a oedd yn derbyn gofal gan awdurdod lleol ond sydd wedi peidio â derbyn y cyfryw ofal o ganlyniad i gael eu cadw'n gaeth mewn sefydliad, naill ai am eu bod wedi eu remandio i'r carchar neu am eu bod wedi cael eu collfarnu a'u dedfrydu gan lys. Bydd y plant a'r bobl ifanc hynny sydd wedi peidio â bod yn blant a phobl ifanc sy'n derbyn gofal, yn blant a phobl ifanc yr oedd llety o dan adran 20 o Ddeddf Plant 1989 (“Deddf 1989”) yn cael ei ddarparu iddynt a hynny cyn iddynt fynd i'r ddalfa, neu'n blant a phobl ifanc a oedd wedi cael eu remandio dan ddedfryd i ofal awdurdod lleol o dan adran 23(1) o Ddeddf Plant a Phobl Ifanc 1969.

entry.title: The Healthcare Improvement Scotland (Inspections) Regulations 2011
entry.summary: These Regulations make provision concerning inspections carried out under section 10I, 10J and 10M of the National Health Services (Scotland) Act 1978 (“the Act”). Such inspections in terms of section 10K of the Act and these Regulations may only be carried out by persons authorised to do so by Healthcare Improvement Scotland (“HIS”).

title.div: The Fruit Juices and Fruit Nectars (Wales) (Amendment) Regulations 2011 / Rheoliadau Suddoedd Ffrwythau a Neithdarau Ffrwythau (Cymru) (Diwygio) 2011

div.p: These Regulations, which apply in relation to Wales, transpose Commission Directive 2009/106/EC amending Council Directive 2001/112/EC relating to fruit juices and certain similar products intended for human consumption (OJ No. L212, 15.8.2009, p.42).

Mae'r Rheoliadau hyn, sy'n gymwys o ran Cymru, yn trosi Cyfarwyddeb y Comisiwn 2009/106/EC sy'n diwygio Cyfarwyddeb y Cyngor 2001/112/EC ynglŷn â suddoedd ffrwythau a chynhyrchion tebyg penodol sydd wedi eu bwriadu ar gyfer eu hyfed gan bobl (OJ Rhif L212, 15.8.2009, t.42).

title.div: The National Health Service (Concerns, Complaints and Redress Arrangements) (Wales) Regulations 2011 / Rheoliadau'r Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol (Trefniadau Pryderon, Cwynion ac Iawn) (Cymru) 2011

div.p: The National Health Service (Concerns, Complaints and Redress Arrangements) (Wales) Regulations 2011 (“the Regulations”) make new arrangements for the notification and consideration of and response to concerns notified by persons in respect of services provided by or under arrangements with the National Health Service in Wales.

Mae Rheoliadau'r Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol (Trefniadau Pryderon, Cwynion ac Iawn) (Cymru) 2011 (“y Rheoliadau”) yn gwneud trefniadau newydd ar gyfer hysbysu, ystyried ac ymateb i bryderon a hysbysir gan bersonau mewn perthynas â gwasanaethau a ddarperir gan neu o dan drefniadau gyda'r Gwasanaeth Iechyd Gwladol yng Nghymru.

title.div: The Student Fees (Qualifying Courses and Persons) (Wales) Regulations 2011 / Rheoliadau Ffioedd Myfyrwyr (Cyrsiau a Phersonau Cymhwysol) (Cymru) 2011

div.p: These Regulations prescribe the qualifying courses and qualifying persons for the purposes of section 28 of the Higher Education Act 2004 (“the 2004 Act”).
Mae'r Rheoliadau hyn yn rhagnodi'r cyrsiau cymhwysol a'r personau cymhwysol at ddibenion adran 28 o Deddf Addysg Uwch 2004 (“Deddf 2004”).

entry.title: The Public Services Reform (Social Services Inspections) (Scotland) Regulations 2011

ukm:Supersedes.dc:title: The Public Services Reform (Social Services Inspections) (Scotland) Regulations 2011

entry.summary: These Regulations make provision concerning inspections carried out under Part 5 of the Public Services (Reform) Scotland Act 2010 (‘the Act’). Such inspections in terms of section 53 and 55 of the Act may only be carried out by persons authorised to do so by Social Work and Social Care Improvement Scotland (‘SCSWIS’).

entry.title: The Smoke Control Areas (Exempted Fireplaces) (England) Order 2011
entry.summary: This Order revokes and replaces with amendments the Smoke Control Areas (Exempted Fireplaces) (England) (No.2) Order 2010 (S.I. 2010/2173).

entry.title: The Finance (No. 3) Act 2010, Schedule 2 (Appointed Day) Order 2011
The Social Security (Claims and Payments) Amendment Regulations 2011
The Additional Statutory Paternity Pay (General) (Amendment) Regulations 2011
The Digital Switchover (Disclosure of Information) Act 2007 (Prescription of Information) (Amendment) Order 2011
entry.summary: This Order, made under the Digital Switchover (Disclosure of Information) Act 2007 (c. 8) (“the Act”), amends the Digital Switchover (Disclosure of Information) Act 2007 (Prescription of Information) Order 2007 (SI 2007/1768) (“the Prescription Order”).

entry.title: The Alder Hey Children’s NHS Foundation Trust (Transfer of Trust Property) Order 2011
entry.summary: This Order transfers trust property held by the Alder Hey Children’s NHS Foundation Trust to the trustees appointed for that Trust under section 51(1) of the National Health Service Act 2006 and makes related provision. A copy of the schedule of trust property transferred under this Order can be obtained from the Department of Health, Quarry House, Quarry Hill, Leeds LS2 7UE.
